nodes.bodyText: nit: for consistency with isLocalAll and else cases postpone return till the end.
nit: final (only for consistency with codestyle).
nit: declaring matchingAllIndices final does not add any value and makes _indices necessary. Drop final from matchingAliases and matchingAllIndices and remove _indices local variable.
nit: prefer new HashSet<>(Arrays.asList()). Sets.newHashSet() is likely to be removed or deprecated in Guava.
nit: order is not important, use Map<>.
Done, I still read/write from stream to avoid breaking protocol compatibility.
As far as I can see Resolved is transient and is never serialized/de-serialized.
Please move next to com.google.common.collect.Sets import.
nit: make type static and remove from equals() and hashCode()
Please remove reference to type from equals() and hashCode().  getType() should return type (no need to wrap).
